title: Kenyan Parliament Erupts in Chaos Over Election Reform Bill
description: Kenya's National Assembly descended into chaos as rival MPs brawled over a controversial bill seeking to overhaul the electoral commission. Security forces intervened to restore order, and the session was suspended indefinitely. Observers fear this could reignite ethnic tensions ahead of the 2027 general elections. US and EU diplomats have urged calm and respect for legal processes. The incident has been independently verified by Reuters and corroborated through satellite imagery, HUMINT, and local reporting. The geo-coordinates of the event are -1.2921, 36.8219. Authorities and analysts warn of further developments and are monitoring the situation closely.
